sentences.en: Europe's largest producer of nylon is based in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 欧洲最大的尼龙制造商总部设在比利时。

sentences.en: He strangled her with a nylon stocking.
sentences.cn: 他用尼龙长筒袜勒死了她.

sentences.en: I slowly zipped and locked the heavy black nylon bags.
sentences.cn: 我慢慢地把那些沉重的黑色尼龙袋的拉链拉上并锁好。

sentences.en: man-made fibres such as nylon and polyester
sentences.cn: 尼龙和涤纶之类的人造纤维

sentences.en: Nylon is a man - made fibre.
Nylon is a synthetic; it is not from nature.
sentences.cn: 尼龙是一种合成纤维, 不是天然物质.

sentences.en: Nylon is made from air, coal and water.
sentences.cn: 尼龙是由空气 、 煤和水加工制成.

sentences.en: She picked up the new nylon umbrella on the sly.
sentences.cn: 她顺手牵羊拿走了那顶新尼龙伞.

sentences.en: She was trussed up with yellow nylon rope.
sentences.cn: 她被人用黄尼龙绳子捆得动弹不得。

sentences.en: The beads were strung on very fine nylon.
sentences.cn: 珠子被串在十分细的尼龙丝上.

sentences.en: The carpets are made in wool and nylon.
sentences.cn: 这些地毯是用毛料和尼龙制成的。

sentences.en: The tent was made of nylon.
There may even be some wire or nylon biting into the flesh.
sentences.cn: 甚至可能有一些金属丝或者尼龙线勒到肉里。

words.tran_cn: 尼龙，[纺]聚酰胺纤维；尼龙袜

phrases.tran_cn: 锦纶丝；尼龙丝；尼龙丝线

trans.tran_cn: [纺]尼龙，尼龙织品，〈口〉尼龙长袜
trans.tran_en: a strong artificial material that is used to make plastics, clothes, rope etc
